settings.overlay_text: Our product assortments are all unique and we offer it for limited time only, ensuring your purchase is as exclusive as your taste. We constantly add new styles to maintain freshness and to ensure your access to something exclusive every time you visit our website. We want you to celebrate every moment and turn cherished experiences into lifelong memories with our wide array of diamond jewelry collections.

settings.overlay_subtext:
Jewelili has jewelry for any & every occasion of your life.
Founded in 2017, Jewelili was launched with the sole purpose of creating affordable fine jewelry. Whether it’s a birthday, an anniversary, a wedding, or just another celebratory moment.
settings.overlay_subtext1: We pride ourselves on offering high quality products at lower values than those available at other jewellers throughout the country. What more, we also have regular flash sales to keep your retail cravings satisfied. Backed by one of the world’s largest fine jewelry manufacturers and knowing the craft well, we are able to extend extraordinary savings to all of our consumers! We are happy, when you are happy and satisfied!

settings.newsletter_subtitle: Subscribe today to get weekly updates!

settings.faq_answer: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here.

settings.subtitle: Shop by Category

settings.birthstone_detail: The diverse Garnet is the birthstone for the month of January. Most commonly seen are the red variants and are known to bring the wearer positivity. They are an ideal addition to your 2nd-anniversary celebration.
The striking Amethyst is the birthstone for February. It comes in many shapes and sizes and is considered a symbol of empowerment and strength. They make for a lovely 6th-anniversary present.

The beautiful Aquamarine is the birthstone for all those born in March. Symbolizing the purity of spirit and soul, it is known to protect the wearer's well-being and can also be presented at a 19th-anniversary celebration.

The birthstone of April, diamonds offer a brilliance like no other. Scintillating and sparkling, it is a symbol of clarity, strength, and eternal love. They are also an ideal gift of choice for a 60th and 75th wedding anniversary.
Emerald is the birthstone for May. A symbol of rebirth, it is believed to grant the owner foresight and good fortune. They are an ideal gift for a 20th or 35th wedding anniversary.

The birthstone for June symbolizes plenty of personality traits ranging from wisdom, purity, and wealth. Pearls have been wildly popular in jewelry for centuries because of their natural beauty and make for a great wedding gift.
Ruby is the birthstone for July. Known as a symbol of power and youthful energy, it is also known to soothe anger. They are traditionally given for the 15th and 40th wedding anniversaries.

Peridot is the birthstone for August and is the world’s most popular and affordable gem, known to bring the wearer prosperity and good fortune. It looks great at any time of the day and is given to celebrate a 16th wedding anniversary.

The September birthstone is the beautiful Sapphire symbolizing sincerity, truth, faithfulness, and nobility. Sapphires make stunning gifts for anyone born in September or celebrating a 5th or 45th wedding anniversary.

The newer October birthstone, the Opal means a “stone with mixed colors” Different colors of Opal are thought to have their own healing properties and are traditionally given to celebrate the 8th wedding anniversary.

Citrine is the birthstone for November. Popular as a stone that soothes tempers and calms the wearer, it is an extremely popular and pretty gemstone. They are an ideal gift given to celebrate the 13th wedding anniversary.

The exquisite Tanzanite is the birthstone for December and is one of the most striking gems known to transform negative thoughts and energies into positive ones. They are an ideal gem given to celebrate the 24th wedding anniversary.

settings.title: Stylish designs & timely delivery
settings.review: I always love shopping with ths website. It’s not the first time I have ordered multiple items at once. The amazing prices for such awesome stylish, beautiful jewelry. It’s actually my third time ordering.. & everything is always shipped in a reasonable time frame!
settings.name: Darnell B
settings.profession: Jewelili Sterling Silver White Diamond Accent Square Shape Stud Earrings

settings.title: Excellent experience with Jewelili!
settings.review: As always, Jewelili has excellent quality, best prices and fast shipping. Always a pleasure to buy from them.
settings.name: Ann P
settings.profession: Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry Sterling Silver and 10k Rose Gold 1/10cttw Ariel Shell Tiara Ring

settings.title: The quality is excellent!
settings.review: The quality of this product is excellent, I wear this ring for work; I work healthcare therefore I wash my hands around 20-30 times a day and the ring has not lost its shine.
settings.name: Miriam
settings.profession: Jewelili Sterling Silver Swiss Blue Topaz and Created White Sapphire Eternity Band Ring

settings.title: Great Symbol
settings.review: Purchased this as a gift to myself this holiday season to commemorate a much loved pet who has passed on. Very pleased to have found a paw print pendant in white gold and very happy this is a hidden bale design. It's perfect in every way.
settings.name: Suzanne I
settings.profession: Jewelili 10K Gold Dog Paw Pendant 18" Necklace

settings.title: Great value for money
settings.review: I wanted an everyday necklace that was beautiful and not to expensive. I got just what I wanted. I loved it so much I bought my friends one too.
settings.name: Kate J
settings.profession: Jewelili Sterling Silver 1/10 Cttw Round Black and White Diamond Tilted Heart Pendant 18" Box Chain

settings.title: Beautiful Heart to Give
settings.review: This was the gift worth giving! I got an excellent response to the gift when I gave it to my GF.
settings.name: Derrick O
settings.profession: Jewelili 10K Yellow Gold 1/2 Cttw Baguette and Round Diamond Heart Pendant Necklace, 18" Box Chain Necklace

settings.title: Shine Bright. Spend Less.
settings.text: Jewelili is owned by one of the world’s largest Diamond Jewelry Manufacturers with over two decades of experience of catering to wholesalers, retailers & customers.

settings.title:
The Jewelili
Promise
settings.text: With an unparalleled dedication to quality and customer satisfaction we offer fine jewelry at rock-bottom prices on every order. Being the largest diamond studded jewelry exporter allows us to eliminate the middle man and bring our customers a large assortment of diamond studded jewelry at incredibly discounted prices.

settings.title: Our products
settings.text: Elevate your everyday with new styles (and discounts!) that are updated frequently. Because of our 20+ years manufacturer & wholesaler expertise, we’re able to offer a large range in the following categories:

settings.title:
New day
New discounts
settings.text: Fine jewelry is better at finer prices! That’s exactly why you should shop from our own brand – Jewelili Diamonds – designed to help you shine bright everyday without the marked up prices. Find your new favorite piece among diamond engagement rings, heart pendant necklaces, diamond tennis bracelets and more.

settings.title: Clearance
settings.text: Irresistible discounts on Fine Jewelry brands like Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry, Star Wars Fine Jewelry, and Made For you Lab Grown Diamond Jewelry. Unbeatable prices on clearance stock of everyday classic styles.

settings.title:
Customizable
Birthstone gifts
settings.text: Jewelry designed by you for you! Use our Bespoke feature to add a sparkling surprise to your gift – customizable birthstone jewelry that you can design with just a few clicks! From a passionate ruby to a fiery citrine and from a cool aquamarine to a deep blue sapphire we’ve got all the gemstones that your jewelry box is missing.
